title: Client issues causing champ select freezes.
body:
Hey Rito, just looking for help or answers.  I keep getting locked in this frozen stasis in ranked champ select/ban and the client freezes up, as well as there being a "ban button" or "lock in button" for it is completely gone.   Now I'm being put into 30 que wait times.  

Just asking for solutions

Thanks Rito!!!

replies.body: It sounds like an unstable connection to champion select is causing you to lose sync and get left behind.  You should run through the steps found in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Test it out in a custom to make sure it's in order.  I hope that helps!
